alert.note: Alert for Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 6:30PM CDT until August 08 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN TANEY COUNTY... At 630 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hollister, or near Branson, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Branson... Lake Taneycomo... Hollister... Kirbyville... Ozark Beach... Powersite... Edgewater Beach... HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
